fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE of NGUYỄN QUỐC  THỌ 
PERSIONAL DETAILS 
Date of Birth: December 27, 1991 
INTRODUCTION 
IT passion since childhood, favorite front-end and be trained in a 
good environment, to try and learn new technology, I want to work as a 
front-end web developer. I give my endurance & passion to reach 
success. Beautiful and high technology animations are my goal, always 
keeping can-do attitude to figure out the way to survive and walk through 
difficulties. The customer satisfaction is the glory that I seek!I want to 
learn the new technology and experience to improve themselves.  
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
1. Twin Real Estate Solutions [4/2018 - Now] as FRONT-END mobile 
app. 
Twin is an application software company about CRM for real estate, 
providing information on buying and selling real estate and Solutions for 
real estate. 
Major technologies: Ionic 3, React Native, VueJS ... 
Twin is Partner with Google Cloud in Vietnam 
More information about Twin 
- I have more project mobile: React Native, Ionic 3… 
- Knowledge about: Firebase, Native code, build app ios/android... 
2. PRIME LABO [3/2017 – 4/2018] as FRONT-END DEVELOPER.  
Prime-Labo is a Japanese offshore programming company. It 
specializes in providing software development services such as 
developing business systems and telephony applications, primarily 
focusing on Web systems for Japanese customers. 
- I have skill about:  Nodejs,  mongodb, webpack... 
- Knowledge about : canvas, vector . 
have the ability to build a private website with nodejs, mongodb, 
reactjs and redux-saga  heroku server:  https://quoctho-
reactjs.herokuapp.com 
3. Officience [1/2015 – 2/2017] as FRONT-END 
DEVELOPER.Officience is a State-Of-The-Art French provider of 
business performance services which has pioneered the outsourcing 
industry in Vietnam. 
- I have skill about HTML 5, CSS3 and code Javascript. 
- Knowledge Basic about : redux, reactJS, react-native 
- Knowledge of Responsive Web design. 
- Can use SASS, LESS and Bootstrap framework. 
- GruntJS and Gulp for Front-end project setup. 
- Have experience about Email template. 
- Can use GIT, SVN. 
- Have experience about, Wordpress and Magento2. 
Also be able to work under high pressure, good sense of teamwork 
and high responsibility, being technically confident, flexibility, 
problem-solving ability. 
SOME PROJECT: 
a. HOUSEMAP: technology solutions for real estate services, Help 
users more easily, conveniently and quickly in (buying, selling, leasing 
and leasing) real estate, helping the market develop transparently, 
Accurate and reliable information. 
- link Android 
- link ios 
This is a large system built in a year. with many features such as: 
Connect real estate supply and demand, sale/rent real estate, find real 
estate on maps, find routes, chat... 
App is created by React Native with the interface of native base, 
generate component with ignite, and redux saga and map. 
b. SKL: SonKim Land's customer application. 
- link Android 
- link ios 
 App provided information about projects, introduce new projects, 
promotions grateful to customers, can deposit and payment notifications 
in batches. 
App is created by Ionic 3 Framework, works on both ios / android and 
ensures performance. 
c. Insight-mind: Use canvas and vectors to create images and 
effects on them. Players can add, delete, edit text and images. change 
color, size. 
It was built by CakePHP to retrieve database, snap-svg render 
(canvas, vector) and Socket-IO . 
 https://insight-mind.com (an.hoang.user@gmail.com/123456). 
d. Enecolor: The system analyzes the results after the user 
answers the questions. 
Back-end is used CakePHP and some other technology serves for 
the analysis. 
Front-end uses ReactJS, Redux ensures highest performance 
 http://13.112.48.85/top (staging). 
e. Monoprix [https://www.monoprix.fr] :  Monoprix supermarket 
is a large system of France, the main task of this project is a convert 
psd to html(template mail). They send PSD and PPTX files, required 
cut image from PSD which they prescribed. After conversion into HTML, 
the next step is to conduct tests on the Browser(Firefox,Chrome) and the 
mail system(Gmail, Yahoo, Outlook).Eventually resubmit html files and 
folders needed for the customer. 
f. TROPIXA: an ecommerce website selling fashion, housewares. 
Builds on the framework Magento2, create a new module added 
magento2. This project is complicated because using Magento2, I feel 
quite interesting with mageto2 structure. But I still have to learn more to 
work with magento2 Link to page 
http://magento2.officience.com/tropixa/(staging). 
g. TESLA: Systems International Bilingual Education in Vietnam, 
builds on the framework is based on WordPress. This is an educational 
site, with pretty nice interface and simple, with the advanced features of 
WordPress. I learned quite a lot about PHP, themes, and how to build a 
WordPress basic themes. Link to page http://tesla.edu.vn/  
h. WOOMENTUM: This is a PHP based site, a hot Singapore 
startup. I work as main front-end maintain for this site. This need 
incredibly fast and small changes which teach me how to arrange my 
priority in task. Understand PHP is a requirement to hands-on the front-
end of this project, I found that PHP essential knowledge (as well as any 
other language) is necessary to become a great front-end engineer. 
Business owner feel happy with that fast delivery which helps she deliver 
her message to Singapore’s Women - I’m proud a part of it. Link to page 
http://woomentum.com/. 
SKILLS 
o ReactJS/ React-Native, Ionic 3, Angular JS 
o Redux-saga/Redux 
o JQuery/ Javascript(es6)/ typescript 
o Nodejs/ Mongoose/ Firebase/ Heroku 
o HTML5/ CSS3/ Responsive / Bootstrap / Semantic 
/Coffeescript/ SASS 
o Git/ Github/ Adobe PHOTOSHOP 
o Npm/ Gulp/ Grunt/ Webpack  
o SQL Server/ MySQL/ phpMyAdmin/Mongodb 
EDUCATION 
* [2015-2016]: Computer center University Of Science Ho Chi Minh 
City 
intensive education HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript, learned to 
solve the problems of layout, animation ... learned many frame work, the 
library for front-end (Bootstrap, animation, gulp ...). 
This is a good environment for me to practice the basic skills of a 
front-end programmer, I practiced many projects here. 
Certificate: about Web Programming HTML5, CSS3, JQuery and 
Bootstrap 
Subjects studied: 
Create web pages with HTML5 language 
Customizable web interface with CSS3 
Responsive to Media Queries 
Handle with Javascript language website 
Using jQuery and jQuery Plugin(jQuery UI) 
Used Bootstrap framework . 
* [2013 – 2015]: National Institute of Information Technology (NIIT)-
HCM. 
Which teach me essential skill as a programmer, I found my self fit 
and love programmer job as long as I discover and work on code. 
Certificate:Diploma (Professional Diploma in Information Technology) 
Subjects studied : 
 Object-oriented programming using C # 
Java Programming Language  
 Data Structures and Algorithms 
 Development of a database application using ADO.NET and 
JDBC 
 Develop web applications using ASP.NET 2.0 language 
Development of distributed applications using .NET Framework 
technology 
Project In schools (NIIT)-HCM 
Library manager 
 Management books, Manage members, manage employees 
(allows to add, delete, edit). 
 Management login, logout of users, user permissions. Smart 
import / export inventory from excel 
Experience gained:I learn how hard it is working as a team - and 
facing real problem of programming in real product.Understand how the 
system works. Intervene more on the system fucntion. It’s an awesome 
experience. 
Web sell images 
Create client side applications and web sites that meet customer 
requirements. 
Develop, code and test web base software using primarily HTML 5.0, 
PHP, Javascript, and CSS3. 
Design, develop and deploy mobile applications using and mobile 
versions of web sites. 
experience gained:Design very carefully, using Html5, Css3, 
Javascript, JQuery, ajax, Bootstrap to design so the pages load speed is 
improved, there are many other nice effects and smooth, impressive for 
users. Support on both desktops, tablets and phones.
